  • Method Details

    • checkEnemyOnPosition

      public static boolean checkEnemyOnPosition(Piece piece, Position position, Chessboard board)
      This method checks if in the given Position there is an enemy Piece.
      Parameters:
      piece - the piece you are calculating the possible positions.
      position - the position you are checking.
      board - the current board.
      Returns:
      true if the position in occupied by an enemy, false otherwise.

    • checkPieceOnPosition

      public static boolean checkPieceOnPosition(Position position, Chessboard board)
      Check if there is a Piece on the given Position on the given Chessboard.
      Parameters:
      position - The position to check.
      board - The chessboard to check.
      Returns:
      true if there is a piece in the specified position, false otherwise.

    • checkPositionOnBoard

      public static boolean checkPositionOnBoard(Position position)
      Check if the Position is on the board.
      Parameters:
      position - The position to check.
      Returns:
      true if the position is in the board, false otherwise.

    • getNewPosition

      public static Position getNewPosition(Piece piece, Position direction, int multiplier)
      Given a Piece, a PieceDirections, and a multiplier, return a new Position.
      Parameters:
      piece - The piece that is moving
      direction - The direction in which the piece is moving.
      multiplier - This is the number of steps the piece will take in the direction specified.
      Returns:
      A new position
